name: flags1
Comments: If 0x10 is set, the part is ephemeral and needs to be cleaned up (e.g. bullet, spawned rope)

name: rope_loc_1
Comments: x,y pair of first rope slot

name: rope_loc_2
Comments: x,y pair of second rope slot

name: bounce_part
Comments: For Mel, field_0x84 points to a house once Mel lands on a surface with it..

name: extra1
Comments: If rope, the rope length from part1 to the next pulley/part. If Mort, countdown timer

name: extra2
Comments: If rope, the rope length from part2 to the previous pulley/part
